### Research Interests
My research in Empirical Economics focuses on Inudstrial Organization and Microeconometrics. Particularly I'm intrested in the effects of mergers with complementary goods and the strategic use of bundling as a way of sustaining collusion. More broadly I'm interested in estimation of dynamic discrete choice models and computational economics.
